title: Bug 6410: File marked as unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is being marked as unchanged even though no changes are made.
OB: When there are no suggestions provided by code assist, the file is still marked as unchanged.
EB: If code assist does not have any suggestions, it should not mark the file as unchanged.
SR:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. For example, consider 'I' to be the cursor below:
Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press CtrlSpace to trigger the code assist.
